definitions.definition: an animal that kills and eats other animals

examples.text: Some animals have no natural predators.
the relationship between predator and prey

definitions.definition: a person or an organization that uses weaker people for their own advantage

examples.text: to protect domestic industry from foreign predators

wordOrigin: 1920s: from Latin praedator ‘plunderer’, from praedat- ‘seized as plunder’, from the verb praedari ‘seize as plunder’, from praeda ‘booty’.
